job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <strong>We support the video game, modeling/simulation, and the geospatial industries! Come join our engineering team!<br><br></strong>This Jobot Job is hosted by Maleakhi Situmorang<br><br>Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.<br><br>Salary $50,000 - $120,000 per year<br><br><strong>A Bit About Us<br><br></strong>Our products and services target the video game, modeling/simulation, and geospatial industries! Our work ranges from full game development services to developing simulations for civil engineering companies!<br><br><strong><br><br><strong>Why join us?<br><br><br></strong></strong>3 weeks of PTO<br><br>Benefits (medical, dental, vision)<br><br>401k matching<br><br>Performance bonuses<br><br><strong>Job Details<br><br></strong>Develops information systems by designing, developing, and installing software solutions.<br><br>Determines operational feasibility by evaluating analysis, problem definition, requirements, solution development, and proposed solutions.<br><br>Develops software solutions by studying information needs, conferring with users, and studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes.<br><br>Investigates problem areas.<br><br>Follows the software development lifecycle.<br><br>Documents and demonstrates solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code.<br><br>Prepares and installs solutions by determining and designing system specifications, standards, and programming.<br><br>Improves operations by conducting systems analysis and recommending changes in policies and procedures.<br><br>Obtains and licenses software by obtaining required information from vendors, recommending purchases, and testing and approving products.<br><br>Protects operations by keeping information confidential.<br><br>Provides information by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing development and service issues.<br><br>Accomplishes engineering and organization mission by completing related results as needed.<br><br>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technical discipline<br><br>2 to 5 years of professional software development experience (game development being ideal)<br><br>Proficiency in C/C++, and object-oriented design skills<br><br>Experience with Unity or Unreal Engine is a big plus!<br><br>Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.<br><br>
